Articles.Content:
so, my question about modeling add-ons is how i can make my add-on wheels turn and run?

and my second question is that, i have made a model but it pass through as to have no contact with the ground

so, how can I do it to have contact with the ground?

is there any tutorial on my questions?

thanks!
Moved to addon development, you'll probably get the help you need here
This autta do it you are looking for a collision mesh but there is a snippet about wheels too

thank you for answering my question but i just started before 3 days so i can't understand it well yet,

so if someone could give me a video tutorial or a step by step tutorial i whould be pleasure!

thank you for reply!!

+1 to your replies!
